Jan. 17, 2009 D Butlins Mineworkers (First Section A)
Butlins Mineworkers (First Section A) 11 Test Piece Contest Butlins Mineworkers butlins-mineworkers-first-section-a Butlins Mineworkers (First Section) None
First
Hostile Skies
Butlins Skegness (Reds), Skegness, Lincolnshire, England, UK In this year, the first section was split into two qualifying pools, A and B, the top three from each of which played off for the overall first section places. Top three placings were not given; these bands were simply notified that they had qualified through being in the top three.
The B section result is here: http://brassbandresults.co.uk/contests/butlins-mineworkers-first-section-b/2009-01-17/
The play off result is here: http://brassbandresults.co.uk/contests/butlins-mineworkers-first-section/2009-01-17/
